title: Hrithik Roshan To Star In An Intense Love Story For Next?
text:
Posted by: Vinod D'souza Published: Thursday, October 22, 2015, 17:39 [IST] 
Hrithik Roshan 's last three movies, Bang Bang, Krrish 3 and Agneepath were not love stories, and now it looks like Hrithik, would be back in an intense love story for his next, and given his nod for the script.The yet-to-be-named intense love story, would be produced by his father Rakesh Roshan , and directed by Sanjay Gupta . For the first time ever, Sanjay would be directing a love story. A source close to the movie was quoted as saying,"The film is an intense love story. Hrithik loved the subject. It's written by a new writer who brought the concept to Sanjay. Directing a love story is also a virgin territory for Gupta, who largely makes action-dramas. Hrithik was so pleased with this beautiful love story that he got papa Roshan on board to produce it."Hrithik Roshan, started off his career in Bollywood with a love story titled Kaho Na Pyaar Hai opposite Ameesha Patel , and the movie was the biggest blockbuster of that time. People flocked to theatres to watch the movie and made Hrithik a success over-night.Hrithik Roshan, is currently shooting for his upcoming flick Mohenjo Daro . It is reported that Hrithik charged a whopping 50 Crores as fee for the movie. The total budget of the movie is 100 Crores and is directed and produced by Ashutosh Gowariker.
